ej,clarj002,P,mcshj901,Fighting ej,hassr001,C,mcshj901,Fighting ej,bondb001,P,mcshj901,Fighting ej,bondb101,C,mcshj901,Fighting $Jerald Clark was hit for the second consecutive time; he charged the mound and exchanged words with Mike Jackson; both benches cleared but no fights broke out; Barry Bonds reignited the conflict and this time the teams exchanged blows; Clark, Bonds, Giants coach Bobby Bonds and Rockies coach Ron Hassey were ejected by HP umpire John McSherry
Debut game for Pedro Castellano
ej,howea001,M,darlg901,Balk call Astros manager Art Howe ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling
ej,bayld001,M,bonig901,Balls and strikes Rockies manager Don Baylor ejected by HP umpire Greg Bonin sometime in game

ej,martr002,P,tatat901,Intentional HBP ej,hayec001,P,tatat901,Charging Ramon Martinez after HBP $Charlie Hayes charged the mound after being hit; Hayes and Ramon Martinez ejected by HP umpire Terry Tata and both teams were warned by Tata
ej,bayld001,M,tatat901,Intentional HBP ej,shepk001,P,tatat901,Intentional HBP Keith Shepherd and Rockies manager Don Baylor ejected by HP umpire Terry Tata
injury?

$Rockies manager Don Baylor spoke to the press after the game about this call after he watched a replay and saw the Alex Cole was safe; HP umpire Charlie Williams was angry that Baylor spoke to the press about this and took his revenge before the next game

ej,bayld001,M,willc901,Continuing argument from night before $3B umpire Charlie Williams took the lineup card from Rockies manager Don Baylor during the pre-game meeting, wadded it up and ejected Baylor from this game; this was a reaction to Baylor's criticism of Williams after the previous game; crew chief Joe West called the Rockies GM and asked for a meeting between Williams and Baylor which took place the next day before that game
ej,galaa001,P,rapue901,Checked swing Andres Galarraga ejected by 1B umpire Ed Rapuano due to a checked swing call for strike three
$Andres Galarraga and Dante Bichette batted out of turn
Debut game for Rondell White

umpchange,2,ump2b,davib902 $After receiving medical treatment, umpire Davidson returns to umpire at 2nd
